Articles.Content:
During a recent routine mission to Minmus I had something very weird happening.

I launched my ship from Booster bay. All was normal, when the first two boosters where empty I jettisoned those, and all was normal.. Or so I thought.

When suddenly I noticed a marker flying a few 100 meters from my ship. It must have been my spend stage.. But it was coming towards me! It missed my ship and flew up faster than my ship was going! It flew for about 50 seconds and then died in its acceleration.

I had nothing on the spend stages that could have given it a boost. The tanks where spend and there was no other propulsion on board.

I made these two screenshots in the map view.
Yeah... same thing happened to me earlier...
